mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SID, PRODUCTID, MANUFACTURE, ORDERNUM, INPORTPRICE, AMOUNT, INPORTTIME, ACTUALNUM, ACTUALPRICE, ACTUALAMOUNT, STOCKOPER, STOCKTIME, SLEVEL, STATUS, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, SAVENUM, CORPID, OPENFLAG, MANUFACTUREID, GROUPID, RECEIVENUM, RETURNNUM, OPERTYPE, RESERVE6, DESCR, RESERVE3, NAME, REMARKS, CONTENT from db_purchaselog where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, SID, PRODUCTID, MANUFACTURE, ORDERNUM, INPORTPRICE, AMOUNT, INPORTTIME, ACTUALNUM, ACTUALPRICE, ACTUALAMOUNT, STOCKOPER, STOCKTIME, SLEVEL, STATUS, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, SAVENUM, CORPID, OPENFLAG, MANUFACTUREID, GROUPID, RECEIVENUM, RETURNNUM, OPERTYPE, RESERVE6, DESCR, RESERVE3, NAME, REMARKS, CONTENT from db_purchaselog
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , SID , PRODUCTID , MANUFACTURE , ORDERNUM , INPORTPRICE , AMOUNT , INPORTTIME , ACTUALNUM , ACTUALPRICE , ACTUALAMOUNT , STOCKOPER , STOCKTIME , SLEVEL , STATUS , OPER , OPERTIME , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE4 , RESERVE5 , SAVENUM , CORPID , OPENFLAG , MANUFACTUREID , GROUPID , RECEIVENUM , RETURNNUM , OPERTYPE , RESERVE6 , DESCR , RESERVE3 , NAME , REMARKS , CONTENT

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MANUFACTURE = #{manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ORDERNUM = #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
INPORTPRICE = #{inportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
INPORTTIME = #{inporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
ACTUALNUM = #{actualnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ACTUALPRICE = #{actualprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ACTUALAMOUNT = #{actualamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
STOCKOPER = #{stockoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STOCKTIME = #{stocktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
SLEVEL = #{slevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SAVENUM = #{savenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MANUFACTUREID = #{manufactureid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RECEIVENUM = #{receivenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RETURNNUM = #{returnnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OPERTYPE = #{opertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE6 = #{reserve6,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
